channel.title: News on Applied Data Science & Artificial Intelligence
channel.description: Recent content in News on Applied Data Science & Artificial Intelligence

item.title: Get to know the 2022 opportunities
item.description: Get to know the 2022 opportunities On June 15, 2022 at 14:00 in the Aula Morin (second floor of the H2bis building in Via Alfonso Valerio 12/1, Trieste) professors and researchers will present the PhD opportunities and they will be availale to answer your questions. The event will also be available in streaming (the link will be available shortly).

item.title: Call for 2022 is out
item.description: 2022 call for application is out The call for application for 2022 is out. There are 14 funded scholarships available and 2 additional non-funded scholarships. Please visit the application page for further details.
